document_data.name: Tenambulum
document_data.mainbody: '''Tenambulum''' was a mage that had a reputation as a [[demon]]-catcher.{{cite book/Expedition to Castle Ravenloft|211}}
document_data.History:
It was relatively little known that Tenambulum's timely aid allowed the Zarovich family to survive when they were displaced from their ancestral lands. He was more famous for his skills as a demon-catcher, and especially as a spellsmith who created such items as the ''[[band of spell enhancement]]'' to better leverage his impressive arcane abilities.

Their library in [[Laothkund]]While the library is never openly stated to be in Laothkund, the thief [[Gage]] is known to have spent his entire life in Laothkund. That he has pilfered that library suggests that the library is, itself, in Laotkhund. was pilfered by the [[rogue]] [[Gage]] in {{yearlink|1374}}, who took the ''[[Hands of Paymon]]''.{{cite book/Stardeep|20}}
